div.p: Single, fully focused on my career I don’t see myself settling down or anything yet as I see once you’re settled and are financially secure
then that’s when I believe you can start off pursuing another life, a happier life with settling down and having a family but at this time I’m in
full time work and I live independently I’ve got my own flat which I have had for a year so yeah...
It’s OK, yeah, it’s OK, I’m enjoying living by myself it gives me a lot of time to work things out in my own time
